column4: hello, i'm having a problem where after closing/opening my laptop lid my laptop screen will go blank quite quickly if I don't do something, is there a way to fix this?
no one knows how to fix my problem?
apparently not, or you haven't described it sufficiently
that's unusual. You could have a look at the scripts in /etc/acpi -- some of those are run in conjunction with lid events. Also look in your system logs
